item.description:
There are two kinds of people in this world: Leaders and followers - this is your opportunity to become a leader.

Would you like to plan and lead your own trips with us?

If so, then the AMC Boston Chapter's Outdoor Leadership Training is a great place to start. I took this class several years ago and I often refer back to the information and materials that were part of the program. So far more than a dozen of the Random Group's organizers have completed this course and are active leaders with both our group and the AMC.

=====

While you can use this event listing to get together with other randomites who are going so you can get together for dinner or to coordinate car pooling, you need to officially register for this program with the AMC. Registration is not yet open but if you have any questions you can send me a note or you can email the program coordinator Stephen Conlin at springleadership@hbbostonamc.org. I will update this listing when the link to register is available.

UPDATE - here is the link to register with the AMC:

  • http://hbbostonamc.org/regi/422

=====

About the Program

This is a great way to learn more about putting together and leading your own trips - whether it's with the Random Group, the AMC, or just a bunch of your friends.

The program emphasizes group dynamics, leader responsibilities, trip planning/management, decision-making skills, and how to handle incidents and emergencies.

You will learn great skills in this supportive and fun environment by engaging in role-playing, decision games, and group planning exercises.

The course consists of two evening classes (Thursday April 4 and Thursday April 11) at AMC Headquarters in Boston and one weekend event (Friday evening April 19 to Sunday afternoon April 21) at Camp Lydon in Sandwich, MA.

The $52 registration fee covers training, materials, weekend lodging and meals (except lunches). Enrollment is limited and previous participation on AMC trips is required. Space is limited to 24 participants so if you want to go you should register as soon as you can since this program always fills up.

=====

Questions

I will be helping teach this program. If you have any questions you can send me a note or you can email the program coordinator Stephen Conlin at springleadership@hbbostonamc.org.
